description:
Wire or needle pegs are light and compact, but sometimes in sand, duff, or light, shifty soil, you need the holding power of wide-sided stakes. These fat boys will answer that need.

  • Sturdy ABS plastic
  • Conspicuous yellow colour reduces loss and toe stubbage
  • Sold individually so you can buy exactly as many as you need
  • 23cm long
name: Coghlan's 23cm ABS Yellow Power Peg Tent Peg
